title: Kuss vs. Roglič: Can Sepp Defend His Vuelta Crown Racing Against His Former Teammate?
content:
Kuss insists there's no bad blood with Roglič now racing on rival Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe: 'It's a good relationship. We’re now competitors.'
